name: Saga Lundqvist
personality: Impulsive, reckless, brilliant in flashes. Half wild-eyed genius, half walking disaster. Addicted to the reaction loop.
background: The youngest on the team and its accidental star. Joined as a joke, stayed for the chaos. Streams everything, crashes often.
physical_description: Freckled, cracked visor, dyed hair that changes monthly. Always bandaged somewhere. Helmet cam is patched with holographic tape.
dialogue_style: Unfiltered. Swears creatively. Half her lines are shouted, the other half whispered to her chat.

relationships.Elin Voss: Terrified of disappointing her. Calls her 'Coach Deathwish' when frustrated.
relationships.Freja Holm: Big sister chaos amplifier. They argue like thunderclouds.
relationships.Mira Nguyen: Respect with a side of 'please fix my drone again.'

static_attributes.augmentation_level: Low – scraped-together neural shifter, illegal reflex patch

training_philosophy: Ride like you stole it, stream like it’s your confession

habits: Kicks her front tire before every ride like a dare
Talks to her livestream chat mid-sentence
speech_patterns: Quotes her subscriber comments like scripture
physical_tics: Cracks her knuckles one at a time while thinking
Tugs her cracked visor into place without noticing
rituals: Starts streams with a war cry or animal sound
Plays her ride playlist backward after a crash
objects: A duct-taped action cam she refuses to upgrade
Glow-in-the-dark bandana from her first ride
